parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From hupo and tasso; to subordinate; reflexively, to obey.

parse: Personal / Reciprocal Pronoun - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: One another, each other. Genitive plural from allos reduplicated; one another.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
(a) fear, terror, alarm, (b) the object or cause of fear, (c) reverence, respect. From a primary phebomai; alarm or fright.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
